error_details.explanation: Incomplete calculation. The term 'sixth_grade_gpa' (value: 93) was omitted from the operation.

context.flawed_solution:
#### 62
The 7th graders average GPA is 2 more than the 6th graders GPA of 93 so 93+2 = 95
If you combine the GPA for all three grades then they have 95+91 = <<95+91=186>>186
The average GPA for the school is 186/3 = <<186/3=62>>62
